name: Rogue Robot
description:
Everyone is the same as you, everywhere! Find the weapon and kill all your robot copy-cats.

Rogue Robot is a Puzzle-Platformer game made in 3 days, from participating in ZenoJam 4.

Goal: Kill all of the robots on the level, before the time runs out. 

Controls: WASD to move, f to shoot and spacebar to jump. 

On rare occasions when walking into walls, jump may be disabled. You can walk back into a wall and it should fix it. 

Music theme: https://freesound.org/people/Xcreenplay/sounds/536539/ Way too good to be made by me.
